availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hiram Bell (Wayne County, Kentucky, notary or soldier)

body.p: Wayne County, Kentucky, justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Son of Joseph Bell and Nancy Bell. Married to Margaret Bell. Father of Lenora Emily Bell, Martha Jane Bell, George W. Bell, Lewis A. Bell, and Alice Bell. Resident of Wayne County in 1850. Justice of the peace in Wayne County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Wayne County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Wayne County, Division 1, p. 317A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Wayne County, Monticello, p. 319-20.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Wayne County, District 7, p. 132B.
